page.title: 16Leisure
page.content: In our area we have youth clubs which are also used for such things as jumble sales where people can buy old things where they are cheap. Some children go to Guides, Brownies, Cubs or Scouts, which are groups of children which do an activity each time they meet, such as swimming or football or cooking. The Brownies are little girls and when they are ten they go up to Guides. The Cubs are little boys who go up to Scouts. There is old-time dancing in the church hall every Saturday and learners are welcome. There is one library at the bottom of Chesterton where you may borrow a book or two for a few weeks.
